Title: Ep #12590 Wednesday 13 May
Plot: In Italy, Stefano confronts Marlena. Abigail and Melanie catch Paul and Sonny in an awkward moment. In Poplar Bluff, Will researches Clyde for his article ? and runs into an imposing Jeremiah. Rafe warns Hope to drop her questions about Clyde.
